properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 8:24AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River at Oliver
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...


.Heavy rainfall of three to five inches is forecast over the Black
Warrior River basin during the next 48 hours...and a flood warning
remains in effect along much of the river.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  8:00 AM Monday the stage was 99.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 90.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 103 feet by
Friday evening and remain near this level through Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 102 feet...Residential flooding begins in the area.
Numerous cabins and trailers in Hale and Greene counties become
flooded. Widespread flooding of lowlands in the area will occur.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
